name: Kermit
quotes: Every journey begins with a single hop.
It's nice to be important, but it's important to be nice.
Life’s like a movie. Write your own ending.
Well, it's sort of approximately how it happened.
Yeah, well, I’ve got a dream too, but it’s about singing and dancing and making people happy. That’s the kind of dream that gets better the more people to share it with.
Well, you see, I'm not a sailor, I'm a frog.
A motorcycle cop is chasing us.
It's too bad the dancing girls are on vacation.
If what I'm saying doesn't make any sense, well then... go ahead and kill me.
